data.title: About Us
data.snippet:
With a robust portfolio of successful projects and state-of-the-art facilities, Pranjal Projects remains at the forefront of engineering excellence, delivering comprehensive solutions that drive India’s infrastructure growth and support critical sectors like oil and gas and heavy machinery.

#### Mission

Deliver high-quality structural steel solutions through exceptional service and customized approaches that exceed customer expectations, fostering trust and long-term success.

#### Vision

To shape India’s infrastructure by delivering quality, innovative projects that drive the nation’s progress towards becoming a global powerhouse.

#### Values [...] # About Us

## About Pranjal Projects

Founded in 1980, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. has established itself as a leading name in the sheet metal fabrication and infrastructure industries. With over 40 years of excellence, we are ISO 9001:2008 and RDSO certified, known for delivering high-quality steel bridges, Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) solutions, and large-scale infrastructure projects.

Beyond our expertise in infrastructure, Pranjal Projects is also a trusted manufacturer of earth-moving equipment parts, boilers, and heavy engineering equipment for the oil and gas sector. Our advanced steel fabrication capabilities allow us to serve diverse industries, providing precise, durable solutions that meet the rigorous demands of these sectors. [...] #### Values

Integrity in all interactions, innovation through cutting-edge solutions, a commitment to sustainability with eco-friendly practices, especially in renewable energy, and excellence in meeting global standards to create lasting value.

## Promoters

data.title: Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. - Steel Fabrication & PEB Experts
data.snippet:
# Ethical & Innovative Steel Solutions

With over 45 years of expertise, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. stands as one of India’s leading infrastructure and fabrication companies. From the steel that builds India’s tallest structures to precision-engineered components that power heavy machinery, we are committed to excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth.

As the largest Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) supplier and an RDSO-approved provider for railways and bridges, we deliver comprehensive solutions that span multiple sectors, ensuring the success of projects across India.

Read More

## Our Achievements & Legacy

#### 45+

years of expertise

#### 1,00,000+

tons of steel fabricated yearly

#### 10,000+

projects executed

India’s largest Pre-Engineered Building supplier [...] ##### Manoj, Director

“Pranjal Projects has consistently delivered innovative and high-quality solar structures for our plants. Their commitment to sustainability and precision engineering makes them a key contributor to our renewable energy efforts.”

##### Amit, Project Manager

## Our Clientele

More Clients [...] ##### Anil, Chief Engineer, Indian Railways

“Their expertise in handling complex bridge construction at challenging locations has been invaluable. Pranjal Projects’ team showed tremendous dedication and technical know-how, ensuring the structures were not only aesthetically pleasing but structurally sound.”

##### Vikram, Lead Structural Consultant, Bridges

“Our collaboration with Pranjal for construction equipment parts has been fantastic. Their components are durable, reliable, and have significantly improved our machinery’s performance.”

##### Suresh, Procurement Lead

“The quality and consistency of their steel products have been unmatched. Pranjal Projects has always delivered custom solutions tailored to our needs, making them a vital partner in our supply chain.”

data.title: Dr. Pranjal Rajendra Singh - JPL Science - NASA
data.snippet:
# Dr. Pranjal Rajendra Singh

Photo of Pranjal Rajendra Singh

#### Address:

4800 Oak Grove Drive

#### Curriculum Vitae:

#### Member of:

## JPL Postdoc

### Biography

Pranjal is broadly interested in probing the large-scale structure of the Universe using a combination of simulations, analytical modeling and multi-probe observations.

### Education

### Research Interests

Weak lensing, large-scale structure, multi-probe analysis, baryonic effects.

### Selected Awards

TAP Travel Award 2024- Theoretical Astrophysics Program, University of Arizona

University of Arizona - CNRS PhD Fellowship 2021-2024

University of Arizona-Newton-Bhabha Fund Summer 2018

### Selected Publications

searches with Gaussian mixture models Physical Review D 102, 104023 (2020)

Co-author

Quantifying an intrinsic alignment analog Physical Review D 110, 043509

Instrument – Probing structure formation at very low redshift arXiv:2407.20867, Submitted to Physical Review D
